website_summaries.verdict: This fast-absorbing primer gives skin a bright, fresh-looking glow.
pros: Primer absorbs quickly into skin to produce a hydrated, natural glow without looking greasy
Prevents makeup from separating or creasing throughout the day
Glides on smoothly over dry patches and fine lines
cons: Strong coconut scent may not appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: I can wear makeup again!  By far the best primer I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I have mature and sensitive skin and this primer is the only one I’ve used that doesn’t irritate my skin or make me break out. Until I found this primer I didn’t like wearing makeup as it would settle into fine lines or pores. This primer feels light weight once applied (although it seems a little thick coming out of the tube - a small amount goes a long way) and concealer or foundation glides on flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE FAKE PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE FAKE PRODUCT!!! This clearly not the real product as it smells like regular suave no scent body lotion. The real product smells like coconuts and is more creamier in texture. This is for sure a knock off scam that they are putting regular body lotion in these tubes. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Irish Angel

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The product I received did not contain the Too Faced product I use. It smells just like Jergens lotion. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It smells like baby lotion ( It should smell like coconut )
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real TF hangover. It smells like baby lotion ( It should smell like coconut ). Please do not buy. The packaging is different from the original. DO NOT BUY THIS PLEASE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Capwell

customer_reviews.title: I don't trust this product, the packaging is off. No scent.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Too Faced Hangover Face Primer from this seller because it was the cheapest price at $25. I don't think this is a legit product. The primer has no smell, and the gold plus is off-centered inside the heart on the box as well as on the primer tube. (Pictured). I want to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Price is deceptive to container size
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but read before you buy. I purchased this item thinking it was the full size container, and I paid the price of a full size container, yet I received the travel size container. Go to Ulta and buy instead.
customer_reviews.author: Singler77

customer_reviews.title: Is it fake?
customer_reviews.text: I received this product with a damaged box. The fragrance is off from my two previous bottles of the same product. The pump does not function as easily. I also noticed the cross on the heart is not the same as my empty bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read a lot!!

customer_reviews.title: Best primer, doesn't make you break out
customer_reviews.text: Favorite face primer ever. I have sensitive skin and I can only use certain things or my face breaks out. This does not make me break out at all. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bethanybax

customer_reviews.title: Does what it promises
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few primers with varying success. Makeup always stays on better with any primer, but not all primers are equal. Two faced Hangover delivers a nice matte finish that lasts the day, and works better than any other primer I've tried so far. It only takes a few drops to cover your whole face, so it's economical as well. I like it better than smashbox, which is pretty good. I think I've found my new face primer!
customer_reviews.author: Binnie

customer_reviews.title: Small quantity
customer_reviews.text: Very small size for the price. It also smells different than the one I purchased from Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: brigette

customer_reviews.title: Not actually a Too Faced product
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a legitamate Too Faced product. The lid is different than what you would buy from them or in a beauty store, it smells different, the texture is different. I used it for one week and my face broke out like crazy. I purchased from the actual store and suddenly the break outs stopped. They said it was a knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super yummy moisturizing primer!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so temperamental. All the primers (and all my skincare products for that matter) have been carefully chosen and vetted. I’m picky because I’ve got sensitive, acne-prone, combination skin that hates so many things! That being said, this was one of my BEST buys! It’s helped moisturize my face so I don’t need to invest in any heavy moisturizers (or really any at all) and it’s helped balance it out so I have less patchiness and acne. So, so impressed. Plus, it works as a primer too so I’m saving money by using less products. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shaezilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Primer!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I use this every morning before applying my foundation. It keeps my makeup on all day!
customer_reviews.author: afullee

customer_reviews.title: No genuine! "Ipsy" tester sample anyway.
customer_reviews.text: This product specifically for this review is awful. Genuine toofaced is amazing! It's like spackle on your face that just soaks in and fills in. This smelled like an expired trials of the "ipsy" or birch box smash ox stuff you get to try by mail. As I got this in one once by ipsy and loved it so this is just expired or heat damaged. Too small to sale. It says so on the box! Give these back to ipsy and just pay for the product at ultra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells bland, but great primer
customer_reviews.text: Not the biggest fan of the scent, which is why I rated it 4 stars instead of 5. It’s smells bland in my opinion. I love this product as a primer though! It works great with dry/sensitive skin, and it doesn’t feel oily or leave my face looking shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: I still had my original too faced primer and this primer is not the same. It smelled different and broke my face out. I returned product and was given full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Reed

customer_reviews.title: Face cream
customer_reviews.text: Wow is the only thing I can say that would adequately describe how amazing this cream is. We saw this on Sephora and watched a video on how to apply liquid foundation using this...blending with the foundation it works great and truly hydrates your face without it feeling heavy or oily.
customer_reviews.author: WM-AB

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! I have very sensitive skin, I even had a dry patch of red skin on my cheek. Since I’ve been using this prior to applying my makeup, no breakouts, my skin is so soft and moisturized and the dry patch is gone. Others are noticing too. Even my hairdresser of 20+ years said my makeup looked amazing. Best compliment ever! I consider her my expert!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like this because it's a fake.
customer_reviews.text: I have the original This product felt like a fake because smell was different and texture was different. The label looked copy. But the original is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite primer. I hate the design of the bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite primer. I hate the design of the bottle and how it pumps out, it makes it difficult to get everything out of it whenever its low. But everything else is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Small size for traveling. Cons: Also it is extremely small size for traveling. Totally think this is a rip off. I suggest going to ulta or sephora and buying the travel size of this product. This did not meet my expectations AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: LOooooveeee this product. I had a mini sample and loved that. This tube is huge. It's bigger than any other primer I've had. Plus the packaging is really nice. Great for dry skin. Not silicone feeling, more watery.
customer_reviews.author: No one

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: The last bottle I had lasted a long time and felt so perfect on my skin. I think I could even use it during the summer. HOWEVER this new bottle smells... stale or rancid? Going to exchange it but I hope this isn’t the new product!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I love how this smells and the smooth texture (not that ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how this smells and the smooth texture (not that weird silicone feeling) but I have an oily nose and chin so it doesn't last very long
customer_reviews.author: StudentNP_

customer_reviews.title: I think it’s fake
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t smell good at all and made my face sticky. This isn’t the same stuff that I bought from ultra. I’m returning. Gross
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on your face with smooth coverage and hydration!
customer_reviews.author: Kells Bells

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: a mild coconut smell, not oily. Absorbed quickly. This is my holy grail!
customer_reviews.author: magical black cat

customer_reviews.title: Melt me
customer_reviews.text: While yes the smell is great, my makeup looks like it’s being melted off my face by the end of the day. I’m left oily and eh no thank you
customer_reviews.author: demi dunham

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of time and $$!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the hype is about this product. It went on oily and didn't really do much to prime my skin. My MagiX Face Perfector did a much better job.
customer_reviews.author: Mocha31

customer_reviews.title: Really wasnt for me made my skin it made it feel greasy!
customer_reviews.text: Made my skin feel kind of greasy I dont like primers like this! I have combo skin bit when I start sweating at work it really gets greasy. And my makeup didnt go on the way I like it to. I like it to look very matte. But someone I know loves it. So to each is on. It might be perfect for somone else. I only used it one time.
customer_reviews.author: Miriah Sears

customer_reviews.title: Same as not using it at all!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do anything. Used it everyday for 2 weeks. So I won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: gildar

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it was legit
customer_reviews.text: The pump was broken and I am unsure if this was actually the product since I have bought this cream many times before. It smelt different
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something’s not right
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girl. She was thrilled until she used it and it wasn’t what she had before. She took it to Sephora and they confirmed it was not the actual product that they sell. FAKE.
customer_reviews.author: Dyligence

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, not greasy, but moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed skin - part oily, part dry. L O V E this product. A little pricey, but worth it. It's lightweight, but moisturizing; not greasy. In the 6 months I've been using it it's kept my skin healthy and refreshed. Can't imagine a morning without it.
customer_reviews.author: Despina E. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all
customer_reviews.text: Box came mangled but product is amazing, works and lasts all day
customer_reviews.author: Kate P.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite primer. It is a bit pricey but worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. A bit smaller than I expected but good for the price. I love this primer, it is one of my favorites because my face feels refreshed after every application.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I tried it via Ipsy, and fell in love. I'd never felt the need to buy primer before, but now I can't live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Emzilla

customer_reviews.title: My favorite! It says it's a primer but I also ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite! It says it's a primer but I also use it as a moisturizer. Has a great smell and the packaging is adorable! This is my favorite moisturizer that I use.
customer_reviews.author: LaTane

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Refreshing and soothing at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Birthday girl's sister

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Great as a moisturizer, not the best as a primer. Was using porefessional and I will be going back to that. Disappointed because I normally love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kalli T.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like how this product felt on my face, so sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin look dewy, and make up last ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin look dewy, and make up last all day long. I put this on under my make up, then use the Too Faced Primer Spray on top of make up, pat it with a sponge and I'm set for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: try this primer
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite primer. I've tried several brands but Too Faced really makes the best!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Kane

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that this was not authentic, but it appears to. Makes my skin smooth and helps the foundation last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a primer.
customer_reviews.text: It's really like a moisturizer ... It does not reduce pores. Ok for a primer if I have set skin
customer_reviews.author: Carmen the Cosmetologist

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks and feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It has become my daily moisturizer/primer! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna B

customer_reviews.title: Best primer I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: Non break out, felt great on my skin, used to hate primer till now, non sticky, amazing will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Primer
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I love it, I want some more of it ! This is my favorite primer. It keeps moisture in and my makeup perfectly in place. Will buy it as long as they make it. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It smells amazing and makes my skin feel fresh
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my first tube of this and immediately ordered another! It smells amazing and makes my skin feel fresh!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: My favorite product right now!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!..my favorite go to product!!..makes pores disappear and smooths my skin out. I use under my concealer!..LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Starfish

customer_reviews.title: My skin is complimented all the time. Even with ...
customer_reviews.text: My skin is complimented all the time. Even with working over 60 hours a week as a floor nurse, I don't look tired and my makeup lasts all shift. I've been told that I'm looking younger rather than aging. I'm in my 40s.
customer_reviews.author: AnCo

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, first time I used this product I was amazed. Its definitely on my reorder list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product meets my rxpectations.
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture. Very lightweight and goes on smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Klepaski

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice and refreshing primer and I would buy the full size of it and love it
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like purchase from Ulta
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite primers from Ulta. THIS Smells like cheap lotion and broke my face out. Stick with a reputable source.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product-Delivers
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really perks up sallow looking skin. I use it before my makeup and it works so well as a primer.
customer_reviews.author: Crissida B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer! I’ve been using it for years. I like to use a number of different lotions depending on my skins needs, weather, and hormones and this is one I always keep in stock. Refreshing without being greasy.
customer_reviews.author: genevieve williamson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the pump on it works super well one of the best primers in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Lily Tomson

customer_reviews.title: I am super sensitive to all skin products
customer_reviews.text: I am super sensitive to all skin products, EXCEPT this one! I LOVE the way it feels and looks on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 do recommend
customer_reviews.text: I life Too Faced and I’ve always wanted to try the primer. It worked FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie T.

customer_reviews.title: Light moisture
customer_reviews.text: Like a very light moisturizer. Helps makeup cling on a little longer and go on a little smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: The best. Moisturizers. Makes your skin look smooth and works well with make up. I want the big bottle now.
customer_reviews.author: Edna J. Neri

customer_reviews.title: A nice coconut primer that smells good (not too strong) and ...
customer_reviews.text: A nice coconut primer that smells good (not too strong) and gives my foundation a nice service to work on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy, glad I only ordered a sample size and even that was expensive
customer_reviews.author: Lola Clark

customer_reviews.title: Received outdated products
customer_reviews.text: I ordered item twice both items smell old and are outdated . They caused me to break out, I have been using this product for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Cade Clemans

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: I like the moistness of the texture. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Boone

customer_reviews.title: Great shipping but okay product.
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about the scent. Smells like glue. Seems like more of a moisturizer when applying.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mcfarlin

customer_reviews.title: Did not come in it’s original packaging
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come in its original packaging so I am skeptical about this being the real deal. Scent and feel of this product seems a little different than what I had purchased from Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Seufzer

customer_reviews.title: ... goes on clear and really freshens up your face- love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: It goes on clear and really freshens up your face- love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgetta

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not cover pores as other primers I've tried in the past but it did feel more natural
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SCAM
customer_reviews.text: SCAM. Bottle was filled with a different lotion that smelled awful. Not the real primer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!!
customer_reviews.text: Really have enjoyed the feel of this product. Works very well as a make up primer.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer porter

customer_reviews.title: Damaged, possibly fake
customer_reviews.text: Seriously? It is unsealed, box is damaged. Is this even an authentic product? Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product. It makes my skin feel smooth.
customer_reviews.author: susana g.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived SIGNIFICANTLY expired. As in, should have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived SIGNIFICANTLY expired. As in, should have been used by October of 2014 according to the date. I attempted to use anyway, and it caused a significant breakout, and acted as a glue against my foundation brush. Absolute rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Both the mist or cream is perfect for that quick fresh look in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Best primer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry flaky skin, hydrates my skin super well and makes my makeup last!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Haft of the size of a travel size!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't try yet! But oh boy, this travel size is a joke! I can't believe I pay $12 for this! Hope it's good as promised to be! *I will update my review of the the product after a few uses!
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Going to have to buy a larger bottle next time. It's great for every day use.. Even when you are NOT hungover. Haha
customer_reviews.author: kelly lopez

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law used it on my face and I had to order some for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good but not right
customer_reviews.text: Good production very small over price it should say mini in the name
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite primers--it feels amazing on my skin and helps my foundation last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Salamon

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: Not much product for price. Better off getting the full size
customer_reviews.author: Trashpanda

customer_reviews.title: Super matte without flaking
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MOISTURIZING PRIMER! I have terrible pores and this takes of that and gives you a matte look all day. I also use their Matte foundation. Oily days are over.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Not the advertised size
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 40 mL bottle and only received a 20mL. You don't get what you pay for. Otherwise I love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Annalise Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase. The product was replaced with a lotion substance.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse95

customer_reviews.title: Hydrates my skin so wonderfully but it doesn't really help my make up stay ...
customer_reviews.text: Hydrates my skin so wonderfully but it doesn't really help my make up stay on longer. Great as a moisturizer though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: ... primer has more of a moisturizer consistency which is great because I'm prone to dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This primer has more of a moisturizer consistency which is great because I'm prone to dry skin. My makeup lasts all day with this on. Was previously using Smashbox Photo Ready which is still a great primer, it smooths out my skin much better than the Hangover Primer, but doesn't keep my makeup on as long. The longer wear and hydration is more important to me because I don't have the time to reapply often during work. Not sure if I would recommend to someone with oily skin. This primer leaves a satiny to dewy finish. Very natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed and feel ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? I paid 17$ for a tube smaller than travel size toothpaste? The smell isn't worth the hype either. Very disappointed and feel ripped off. I'm going with a low budget product next time that will surely have more to offer. Furthermore, I applied it to my skin and it did nothing to minimize my pores whatsoever. Avoid purchasing this product. Don't be fooled by the cute packaging as I was!!! Learn from me. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I love it! The scent and texture against my skin is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Matle

customer_reviews.title: Not for combination to oily skin. Also such a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not for combination to oily skin. Also such a rip off for a small tube. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Ransford

customer_reviews.title: Does what is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, combination skin and this works well for me. In the winter, I still need more moisture, but I could see this working great without any moisturizer in the summer. Need only a dab of this product, spreads well, and drys pretty quickly so I don't have to wait too long before applying make up. Have only used it twice now. My make up routine includes moisturizer, this product, then concealer, followed by a foundation powder. The product I used before this was Jouer primer, and I would say this is less moisturizing, but helps make-up last longer. Does not help very much with "crepe-ing" of make-up.
customer_reviews.author: Kate-EEE

customer_reviews.title: Really good product...BUT
customer_reviews.text: I am very impress the way this product performed. It is really good. And the only reason I give 4 stars is because the product packaging wasn't sealed what is concerned but I went to the Sephora and compare both products. Fortunatelly it is genuine. No buying for the same vendor again though
customer_reviews.author: alexandra h.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My most favorite primer, weightless and rejuvenated feel! Foundation and shadows glide right over it
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, it's smooth on the face and dries really fast
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not really like it, in fact, I have a little disappointment about this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product makes my skin look a little too Dewey.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lewis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's not the same size what showing on the picture!
customer_reviews.author: anastas

customer_reviews.title: Not a hangover cure by any means
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT anything more than unscented lotion. I am a huge fan of Too Faced products especially foundations and face makeup. This is a major flop. The packaging is super convenient because there is a pump. However, the claims it makes are untrue. I live in Florida and have dry skin and apply spf moisturizer daily. This does not improve hydration, makeup longevity, application or the look of the makeup at all. Very disappointing that I returned it because it was just not what it should have been. My makeup last and looks better without it. Even reviewed it
customer_reviews.author: It’s Me

product_meta.title: Too Faced Hangover Rx Replenishing Face Primer 0.68 FL
product_meta.description: Size:Travel sizeA replenishing face primer that hydrates, smoothes, and brightens skin for a dewy, healthy looking finish. What it does: Cure your next beauty hangover with Hangover, a revolutionary makeup primer that's infused with coconut water, a probiotic-based ingredient, and skin revivers which work together to boost skins radiance, promote elasticity, and help hydrate while locking down makeup for fresher, longer, and more flawless wear. Too Faced harnessed the science of hydration to create a creamy, penetrating primer that acts like an energy drink for the skin by replenishing moisture levels. It can be worn alone for a dewy, healthy looking finish, or under bronzers, foundations, and powders to create the perfect canvas. What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens - Sulfates - Phthalates What else you need to know: This product is cruelty-free, vegan-friendly, and silicone-free. Research results: In a consumer study, after 1 week of use of primer at home: - 100% said skin looked more hydrated - 100% said their skin had the appearance of a full nights rest (immediately after use alone on clean skin) - 100% said makeup went on smoother In a consumer study, after 8 hours of use at home: - 100% said makeup looked more radiant with primer and foundation application
feature_bullets: Our replenishing face primer is your instant cure. It hydrates, smooths and brightens skin for a dewy, healthy looking finish.
